name: GXSM for Windows
short_description:
Gxsm for Windows is the Windows version of the GXSM - Gnome X Scanning Microscopy, a complete open source software solution designed for Scanning Probe Microscopy-SPM techniques ( Scanning Tunneling Microscopy-STM, Scanning Force Microscopy-AFM...), but also SPA-LEED...

The Windows version is up-to-date and keeps all the features as the Linux version as possible.

Gxsm for Windows currently supports DSP hardware controller from Softdb such as  SignalRanger SR1, SignalRanger SR2...
summary: Universal STM/AFM/SARLS/SPALEED controlling and data analysis software

license.fullpath: License :: OSI-Approved Open Source :: GNU General Public License version 2.0 (GPLv2)
